Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Sonata in F major, KV 533+494

1786 (mov. 3), 1788 (movs. 1–2) · KV1,2,3,6 494 (mov. 3), 533 (movs. 1–2)

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 26' 30"

  • 1. Allegro
  • 2. Andante
  • 3. Rondo: Allegretto

For publication as a sonata, Mozart combined an allegro in F major and an andante in B-flat major (KV 533) with a rondo in F major (KV 494).

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/25/2 · BA 4601-01 · Klaviersonaten / Band 2 · ed. Wolfgang Plath / Wolfgang Rehm [including first version of mov. 3]
  • Associated Board · Sonatas for Pianoforte / Volume II · ed. Stanley Sadie
  • Associated Board · ed. Stanley Sadie
  • Bärenreiter · BA 4862 · Klaviersonaten / II · ed. Wolfgang Plath / Wolfgang Rehm [including first version of mov. 3]
  • Henle · HN 2 · Klaviersonaten / Band II · ed. Ernst Herttrich
  • Henle · HN 1002 · Klaviersonaten / Band II · ed. Ernst Herttrich
  • Henle · HN 3 · Klaviersonaten · ed. Ernst Herttrich
  • Henle · HN 1041 · ed. Ernst Herttrich
  • Könemann · K 104 · Sonaten, Fantasien und Rondi 2 · ed. István Máriássy [including first version of mov. 3]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50227 · Klaviersonaten / Band 2 · ed. Ulrich Leisinger
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50230 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Spätere Werke · ed. Ulrich Leisinger [first version of mov. 3]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50299 · Die drei Rondos für Klavier · ed. Ulrich Leisinger [first version of mov. 3]

1. Allegro

Duration: 10' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Andante

Duration: 10'

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Rondo: Allegretto

Duration: 6'

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Rondo: Andante (first version)

The rondo exists in a shorter, earlier version before Mozart paired it with the allegro and andante.

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 2.5
